text: Arau yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haiche, tumi yadi sihamtara ocarata sakalo dalila lai aha tathapi'o sihamte tomara kibalara anusarana nakaraiba; arau tumi'o sihamtara kibalara anusarai nahaya; arau sihamte'o parasparara kibalara anusarai nahaya. Tomara ocarata satya-jnana ahara pichato yadi tumi sihamtara prabrttira anusarana karaa, tente niscaya tumi yalimasakalara antarbhukta haâ€™ba
